text: A Son of the Desert is a 1928 American silent drama film directed by Merrill McCormick and starring McCormick, Marin Sais and Bob Burns.Munden p.743 ==Synopsis== Helen Dobson, an American art student travelling through the Arabian peninsula arranges to paint the portrait of a sheikh but soon finds herself in trouble and is rescued by a Texas cowboy friend. ==Cast== * Merrill McCormick as Sheik Hammid Zayad * Marin Sais as Helen Dobson * Bob Burns as Steve Kinard * Faith Hope as Zuebida * Jim Welch as Colonel Dobson ==References== ==Bibliography== * Munden, Kenneth White. The American Film Institute Catalog of Motion Pictures Produced in the United States, Part 1. University of California Press, 1997. ==External links== * Category:1928 films Category:1928 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:American black-and-white films
title: A Son of the Desert
